name: Chronicles of The Himalayas
description:
Chronicles Of The Himalayas is an adventure and mystery game set in the Himalayan wilderness. Immerse yourself in its hidden world, and you'll experience an extraordinary reality where folklore and magic come together.

An epic story of a 15-year-old Sherpa boy from a secret village in the Everest region who sets out to find his missing father. But destiny leads him to discover his origins.
